quick_answer.text: A Whopper Jr provides about 340 kcal and 15 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Whopper Jr without mayo?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal, saving 90 kcal from the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: Approximately 15 g of protein per Whopper Jr.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: Around 570 mg of sodium, which is about 25% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: Yes, about 28 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 7 g sugars from the bun and condiments.

faqs.q: How does a Whopper Jr compare to a full Whopper in calories?
faqs.a: A Whopper Jr has 340 kcal; a full Whopper has about 670 kcal, roughly double.
